name: Chicken Cheese Steak Sandwiches
description: Chicken cheese steak sandwiches with onions, peppers and plenty of melted provolone cheese!
ingredients: 1 pound boneless skinless chicken breasts or thighs, thinly sliced
4 hoagies/buns/rolls, cut in half (optionally toasted) (gluten-free for gluten-free)
instructions: Marinate the chicken in the mixture of the oil, garlic powder, oregano, cayenne, salt, and pepper for 20 minutes to overnight. Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat, add the onions and peppers and cook until tender and lightly caramelized, about 5 minutes, before setting aside. Add the chicken and cook, about 5-8 minutes, mix in the soy sauce and Worcestershire sauce, mix and cook for a minute. Mix in the onions and pepper, place the cheese on top and let it melt, about 2-3 minutes. Divide the chicken cheesesteak mixture between the buns and enjoy!
